channel.title: Can some1 help me plz
channel.description:
I need help with making a shop that isnt allready in my server. Hes called Horvik and i dont kno how to make him have items in his shop.
Also i was on this server once and they had a clone of the owner which was a npc. I was wondering if any1 could tell me how to make one of them.

item.title: Can some1 help me plz
item.dc:creator: @xstrxpurez xstrxpurez
item.description:
@xstrxpurez wrote:

hm i use dodian all the time. and if u want to add it then well change 1 of the shops u dont need and change the npc id to santas id and well start adding the items like it shows.

Read full topic

item.title: Can some1 help me plz
item.dc:creator: @hero_0777 hero 0777
item.description:
@hero_0777 wrote:

Hmm but if say i want to add santa where do i put his id in shops? This is what i got. Im using Dodian v7.0

shop = 43	@gre@Santa_Chris_&_Alex_Shop!			2	2	1038	1000	1040	1000	1042	1000	1044	1000	1046	1000	1048	1000	2422	1000	1050	1000	1053	1000	1055	1000	1057	1000	4587	1000	1419	1000	6889	1000	6916	1000	6918	6920	1000	6922	1000	6924	1000

Read full topic

item.title: Can some1 help me plz
item.dc:creator: @xstrxpurez xstrxpurez
item.description:
@xstrxpurez wrote:

to add the items to his shop u need to go in to shops.cfg and find his shop id then start adding the items u want in it if u cant find the shop id then such his name and then u can add the item id the amount u want of them and so on.

Read full topic
